prompt.purpose: Provide constructive feedback after a simulated clinical scenario.
prompt.context: The trainee has completed an endoscopic device insertion on a cadaver model.
prompt.instructions:
1. Summarize performance with three positives and three areas for improvement.
1. Ask one follow-up reflective question.
1. Offer a corrective tip with brief rationale.
1. Maintain a professional, supportive tone.
prompt.output_format: Bullet points followed by a short reflective question.
